metadata.title: CVE-2024-10464 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Repeated writes to history interface attributes could have been used tocause a Denial of Service condition in the browser. This was addressed byintroducing rate-limiting to this API. This vulnerability affects Firefox <132, Firefox ESR < 128.4, Thunderbird < 128.4, and Thunderbird < 132.

criterions.comment: mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
